rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy/2015/0317/Oil-prices-plunge-to-6-year-low.-Why-gas-prices-won-t-follow-suit.-video">     <title>Oil prices plunge to 6-year-low. Why gas prices won't follow suit. (+video)</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy/2015/0317/Oil-prices-plunge-to-6-year-low.-Why-gas-prices-won-t-follow-suit.-video</link>     <description><p>After rebounding in February, oil prices hit a 6-year-low on oversupply concerns. But this time around, the drop in crude prices may not mean as big a drop in gas prices as you might think.&nbsp;</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/MImBphabnu8" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0317/US-and-global-oil-prices-are-diverging-again.-Here-s-what-that-means">     <title>US and global oil prices are diverging again. Here's what that means.</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0317/US-and-global-oil-prices-are-diverging-again.-Here-s-what-that-means</link>     <description><p>A domestic oil glut helped bring US crude prices inline with the global benchmark. But in the last month or so, the spread between the two has widened again.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/LlFi9nDb2U4" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/2015/0316/Sea-lion-pups-washing-ashore-in-California-test-capacity-of-rescue-network-video">     <title>Sea lion pups washing ashore in California test capacity of rescue network (+video)</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/2015/0316/Sea-lion-pups-washing-ashore-in-California-test-capacity-of-rescue-network-video</link>     <description><p>Never have sea lion pups washed up on California beaches in such high numbers. Scientists point to a few potential reasons for the strandings.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/LkrGuZC_bLE" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/2015/0316/Record-number-of-endangered-manatees-spotted-in-Florida-s-annual-count-video">     <title>Record number of endangered manatees spotted in Florida's annual count (+video)</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/2015/0316/Record-number-of-endangered-manatees-spotted-in-Florida-s-annual-count-video</link>     <description><p>Surveyors counted 6,063 manatees during February flyovers along the state\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds east and west coastline, topping the previous high-count found in 2010 by nearly 1,000 individuals.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/Ux0T-97wTQ0" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy/2015/0316/Why-global-emissions-stalled-last-year-Recharge">     <title>Why global emissions stalled last year [Recharge]</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy/2015/0316/Why-global-emissions-stalled-last-year-Recharge</link>     <description><p>Worldwide emissions stall despite continued global economic growth; US solar has a banner year; China scales up on nuclear power. Catch up on global energy with Recharge.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/JmQ0BpnkglI" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0316/Global-emissions-pause-comes-amid-China-s-clean-energy-push-video">     <title>Global emissions pause comes amid China's clean energy push (+video)</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0316/Global-emissions-pause-comes-amid-China-s-clean-energy-push-video</link>     <description><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/ES-h6bJKP4Y" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy/2015/0313/Not-all-oil-is-created-equal.-Why-that-matters-for-climate-change">     <title>Not all oil is created equal. Why that matters for climate change.</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy/2015/0313/Not-all-oil-is-created-equal.-Why-that-matters-for-climate-change</link>     <description><p>A new report documents the climate impacts of various types of oil. As governments address climate-warming greenhouse gases, that information could help policymakers and industry prioritize oils based on their emissions.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/OTpC3FG9qJo" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/2015/0312/How-the-little-Channel-Islands-fox-came-back-from-near-extinction-video">     <title>How the little Channel Islands fox came back from near-extinction (+video)</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/2015/0312/How-the-little-Channel-Islands-fox-came-back-from-near-extinction-video</link>     <description><p>Tiny foxes are native to California\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Channel Islands, but they were driven to near-extinction by events tied to human activities. Now, they\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdve made a remarkable comeback.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/FBgSGF3aNlU" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy/2015/0312/Report-US-wind-power-tomorrow-will-be-what-coal-power-is-today-video">     <title>Report: US wind power tomorrow will be what coal power is today (+video)</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy/2015/0312/Report-US-wind-power-tomorrow-will-be-what-coal-power-is-today-video</link>     <description><p>President Obama has made wind energy a key component of his efforts to reduce greenhouse emissions from the US power sector. A new report suggests it could make up more than a third of US power production by midcentury.&nbsp;</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/7a5Rz5DDoAU" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0312/Nicaragua-s-clean-energy-progress-has-only-just-begun">     <title>Nicaragua's clean energy progress has only just begun</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0312/Nicaragua-s-clean-energy-progress-has-only-just-begun</link>     <description><p>Spurred on by high oil prices and an unreliable grid, Nicaragua attracted $1.5 billion in renewable energy investement between 2006 and 2012. Now it gets about half of its electricity from renewable sources.&nbsp;</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/Wm4zXmlCe6c" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0311/Why-China-s-nuclear-plans-in-Pakistan-draw-global-criticism">     <title>Why China's nuclear plans in Pakistan draw global criticism</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0311/Why-China-s-nuclear-plans-in-Pakistan-draw-global-criticism</link>     <description><p>China\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds decision to build nuclear reactors in Pakistan has received criticism for defying international norms on nuclear technologies trade.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/zqVfUcr-U9Q" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0310/Finding-solutions-for-a-fracking-wastewater-problem">     <title>Finding solutions for a fracking wastewater problem</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0310/Finding-solutions-for-a-fracking-wastewater-problem</link>     <description><p>While a truly viable and scalable solution to fracking wastewater is not yet at hand, there are several contenders that suggest a breakthrough is just around the corner, writes Colin Chilcoat.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/zRNQDRWh26E" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/2015/0309/Did-Florida-prohibit-environmental-workers-from-saying-climate-change-video">     <title>Did Florida prohibit environmental workers from saying 'climate change'? (+video)</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/2015/0309/Did-Florida-prohibit-environmental-workers-from-saying-climate-change-video</link>     <description><p>According to an investigative report, workers for Florida's Department of Environmental Protection have been barred from using the term 'climate change' in official research.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/IaTLkT6ydL8" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/2015/0309/Solar-powered-plane-embarks-on-round-the-world-flight-video">     <title>Solar-powered plane embarks on round-the-world flight (+video)</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/2015/0309/Solar-powered-plane-embarks-on-round-the-world-flight-video</link>     <description><p>Two Swiss pilots are flying a completely solar-powered plane around the globe to demonstrate the importance of renewable energy.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/VrRPTH89Q44" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy/2015/0309/Oil-under-siege-in-Libya-Iraq-Recharge-video">     <title>Oil under siege in Libya, Iraq [Recharge] (+video)</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy/2015/0309/Oil-under-siege-in-Libya-Iraq-Recharge-video</link>     <description><p>Oil fields caught in the crossfire in Libya and Iraq; A coal mine tragedy in Ukraine; Shifting winds in US energy policy. Catch up on global energy with Recharge.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/eKW6S27Winc" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0309/UK-aims-to-block-Russian-oligarch-s-gas-project-in-North-Sea-video">     <title>UK aims to block Russian oligarch's gas project in North Sea (+video)</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0309/UK-aims-to-block-Russian-oligarch-s-gas-project-in-North-Sea-video</link>     <description><p>The United Kingdom&nbsp;aims to block the purchase of North Sea oil and gas assets by Mikhail Fridman and his Luxembourg-based LetterOne investment vehicle. The UK is concerned Mr. Fridman may fall under Western sanctions and slow production in the North Sea.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/X5QZ3LIumBs" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy/2015/0308/Does-daylight-savings-actually-save-energy-video">     <title>Does daylight savings actually save energy? (+video)</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy/2015/0308/Does-daylight-savings-actually-save-energy-video</link>     <description><p>Daylight savings has been introduced multiple times over the years to save electricity. One problem: multiple studies find, at best, zero net energy savings.&nbsp;</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/zigCBYjtebY" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0306/The-EU-s-other-Union-Can-energy-unite-Europe">     <title>The EU's other 'Union': Can energy unite Europe?</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0306/The-EU-s-other-Union-Can-energy-unite-Europe</link>     <description><p>For the European Union's Energy Union to work, Brussels must convince member states to support a durable European solution to their energy challenges, writes Kristine Berzina of the German Marshall Fund \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd even if that means putting up with EU bureaucracy.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/7Ryhl8efj9M" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy/2015/0305/Can-Republicans-block-Obama-s-clean-energy-plans">     <title>Can Republicans block Obama\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds clean energy plans?</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy/2015/0305/Can-Republicans-block-Obama-s-clean-energy-plans</link>     <description><p>Now in control of Congress, the GOP has more leverage to take on President Obama's climate and energy policies. This week was a taste of what's to come.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/LtK12s4TM1E" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0305/How-much-does-the-US-spend-on-energy-research-Not-a-lot">     <title>How much does the US spend on energy research? Not a lot.</title>     <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/Environment/Energy-Voices/2015/0305/How-much-does-the-US-spend-on-energy-research-Not-a-lot</link>     <description><p>US funding for energy research development and demonstration is detrimentally modest, according to a new report. Here's how the US spends the roughly $5 billion it allocates to energy research each year.</p><img src="//feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/environment/~4/JZDztynYZjg" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>   </item> </rdf:RDF>
